name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 介紹生產與服務系統之模擬系統模式建立與分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。本堂課程包含模擬系統模式的基本觀念、模式的建立、模擬資料的驗證與確認、模擬情境的設計與比較、以及電腦軟體的使用，課程重點乃強調實際動手操作以建立模擬電腦模式的能力。
schedule:
Week #1. Introduction to System and Simulation Modeling 
Week #2. Examples, Spreadsheets, Principle Concepts
Week #3. Statistical Models in Simulation
Week #4. Queueing Systems
Week #5. Introduction of Arena
Week #6. Input Modeling and Input Analysis
Week #7. Modeling a Manufacturing System
Week #8. Steady-State Simulation
Week #10. Validation & Verification
Week #11. What-If Analysis
Week #12. Optimization
Week #13. Detail Operation Modeling
Week #14. Advanced Module in ARENA
Week #15. Random Number Generation
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10%
Homeworks: 30%
Term Project: 20%
Midterm Exam: 20%
Final Exam: 20%
materials:
1. 郭幸民. (2014), 系統模擬與Arena應用, 滄海書局.
2. Banks, J., Carson II, J.S., Nelson, B.L., and Nicol, D.M., (2010). Discrete-Event System Simulation, 5th Ed., Prentice Hall.
